text: Hi, I have 5 new pages in the "Content staging-area", how can I publish/go live with only 1 of these? I only see that all 5 goes out at the same time when i klick publish.
in the publish tab in staging, you should be able to just check off one of the pages and the button should then change from “Publish all to live domain” -> “Publish page to live domain”

How do I make the background of an email template transparent?  Right now it's defaulting to a white background, I would rather have it transparent and then my modules contain the bg-color.  Is there a way to do this or not?
Is there a way to limit the number of characters in a rich text editor when building a template?
Hello everyone. Has anyone ever gotten this? what permissions is it referring to?
Does that use HubDB?  Only Accounts with the Websites add on (non starter version) get access to HubDB
nope, loops in a custom module
hmm, can you DM the account you are trying to migrate this to?
Are you copying an email-compatible module to a portal without email access?
